# An all-in-one childcare software for superstar centers

Illumine is the most loved  childcare software and is used by over 1000
schools worldwide. It streamlines all your childcare operations, simplifies
billing, attendance, parent communication, and assessment processes.

BOOK A DEMO

1000+ reviews! 4.9

__ __ __ __ __ 5/5

## Illumine at a glance

## Why millions of educators and parents love Illumine?

Efficiently run your center and classroom with contactless check-in, digital
billing,  admissions, reports, lesson plans, and more

#### Increase Admissions

Track your leads, get follow-up reminders, and manage your leads efficiently-
your key to turning prospects into admissions.

## 58%

Enrollments Increased

#### Save time and money

Save thousand of dollars by digitising your childcare processes and by
replacing all other softwares with a single platform.  

## $1200

Savings on resources per month

#### Increase staff productivity

Enable your staff to be precise, efficient, and quick by making them spend
less time on spreadsheets, emails while getting the job done faster than ever

## Up to 45 hours

Spent less on manual tasks

## Your complete preschool & childcare software

Manage all your childcare operations from one place!

####  Student management

####  Multicenter reports

####  Billing and Invoicing

####  Child assessments

####  Parent communication

####  Leads Managment

####  Digital attendance

####  Plan and create lessons

## Simplify your center management

Manage payments,  student-teacher ratios, enrolments, manage, send daily
reports and enable seamless parent-teacher communication – all from one place.

###  Billing & Payments

Automate billing, send invoices, track all payments, & send timely fee
reminders.  
Know More →

###  Parent Communication

Keep parents in the loop with their kid’s activities with real-time updates.
Parents love Illumine!  
Know More →

###  Digital attendance

Record student and staff attendance by using the QR code scanner. Only
authorised guardians are allowed to **pick** the children. The app also allows
you to **record temperature** during check-in and check-out.  
Know More →

## Enhance parent experience

Keep parents up-to-date with their child’s development in the most interactive
way. Encourage parent-teacher collaboration and make life easier for your
teachers.

###  Photos & videos

Share every precious moment of the little ones through pictures and videos.  
Know More →

###  Daily reports

Share daily schedule, activity, assessments, and meal reports with parents.  
Know More →

###  Child portfolios

Help parents keep track of their child’s overall progress and development.  
Know More →

## Empower teachers and drive learning

Plan and share lessons, hold virtual classes, meet all the licensing standards
and improve your quality ratings with the software for kindergarten students

###  Lesson plans & assignments

Create and share lesson plans, send assignments, and monitor submissions using
this kindergarten software  
Know More →

###  Child assessments

Teachers can effectively create child assessment by using the evidence and
observation they have recorded over time.  
Know More →

###  Virtual classroom

Schedule online classes with a click of a button without any additional
software.  
Know More →

## Grow your childcare with  Illumine's childcare CRM

Streamline your sales pipeline and provide easier, faster ways for parents &
waitlisted families to enroll.

###  Leads dashboard and reports

Understand your lead pipeline better by managing it using the online
registration software. Get information on a lead’s source, status, and
upcoming follow-ups.  
Know More →

###  Automate your emails

Our drag-and-drop email editor or built-in email templates lets you save
customized emails and allows you to automatically send them to the parents.

###  Never miss another follow-up

Get reminders on upcoming tasks and stay on top of every lead. Leads flow
directly into Illumine for automated, fast follow-ups ensuring no
opportunities fall through the cracks.

## Why should you choose Illumine?

We take the time to understand your unique business requirement and use cases
and deliver exactly what your business needs

###  Onboarding

We take care of onboarding and setting up all your data. We work closely with
you to ensure your entire experience with the platform is smooth and seamless.

###  Multi-Center support

We aspire to grow your business and increase the number of centers under your
umbrella. We provide automation, reports, alerts, and much more to help
kickstart your growth journey.

###  Language Translation

We support a positive multilingual experience for users, helping boost
parents’ trust in your brand which inherently increases enrollments and
revenues at your center.

###  Training

We conduct multiple training sessions for all your staff. We make sure they
understand the system and its functioning thoroughly.

###  Payment processing

We are the only childcare software provider that does not charge any
commission & setup charges for payment gateways. We also support the most
number of countries.

###  Privacy

We take data privacy seriously. We are a GDPR compliant company which means no
one gets to access your data except you.  

##

**Most trusted childcare management system software for preschools and
daycare**

Our child care center software is used by over 500 schools across the world.
The childcare app is available for IOS, Android, MAC, Windows, and Linux in
multiple languages

## Customers love our childcare software

Over 1000 five stars reviews across G2, Capterra, Software Advice, Playstore
and Appstore

## We’ve made our platform as flexible as it gets,  
just for you.

Make Illumine your own. Customise plans as per your requirements.

GET A CUSTOM QUOTATION

## Transform the way you run  
your childcare business

## Used by over 1000 schools across 20 countries

Sign Up For A Free Trial

Start your 11-day free trial with all features. No credit card required.

## Run your business like a pro with the  
#1 childcare management platform

Start with a plan that suits your business, with the flexibility to upgrade
and downgrade anytime according to your needs. No hidden costs.

GET A FREE DEMO

## Why should you choose Illumine?

We take the time to understand your unique business requirement and use cases
and deliver exactly what your business needs

###  Onboarding

We take care of onboarding and setting up all your data. We work closely with
you to ensure your entire experience with the platform is smooth and seamless.

###  Multi-Center support

We aspire to grow your business and increase the number of centers under your
umbrella. We provide automation, reports, alerts, and much more to help
kickstart your growth journey.

###  Manage online registrations & admissions

Illumine gives you an easy to use form builder to build your admissions forms.
You can embed these forms in your website or simply share it in groups to make
online registrations.

###  Training

We conduct multiple training sessions for all your staff. We make sure they
understand the system and its functioning thoroughly.

###  Payment processing

We are the only childcare software provider that does not charge any
commission & setup charges for payment gateways. We support ACH, Netbanking,
Debit & Credit card at lowest costs.

###  Privacy & Security

We take data privacy seriously. We are a GDPR compliant company which means no
one gets to access your data except you.

## Frequently Asked Questions

____ How Long are your contracts?

We give options for Annual, Semi Annual , Quarterly and monthly contract
options.

____ Is there a discount for yearly service?

Yes, if you choose to opt for an annual plan of Illumine, you get exclusive
discounts.

____ My student numbers change every month. How will you handle billing?

We often suggest fixing a cost center-based package where you have to pay a
fixed amount irrespective of a number of students. If you opt for the student-
based package we make the necessary adjustments at the end of the month
billing.

____ Are they any hidden costs?

No, you wouldn’t come across any sorts of hidden costs while using our
platform. We believe in transparency so we make sure all the necessary
information is communicated to the customer beforehand.

____ Is there any setup cost?

No, there are no setup costs involved in deploying Illumine at your center.

____ I am using some other software. Will I be able to migrate data?

Yes, if you’re already using administrative software, we can import your data
into Illumine in no time. Just ask one of our customer support team or drop an
email at info@myillumine.com about this.

____ How often do you provide updates?

The world of technology is a fast-changing space. We need to keep up with
trends to sustain and thrive. At Illumine, we release monthly updates to our
preschool management software to add the latest facilities. Even when we are
not sending you updates, our research team is continually looking for ways to
make your experience holistic.

____ How do you price for large childcare centers?

Our basic plans are listed on our pricing page. For larger schools we offer
custom feature development, integration and discounts. We provide unlimited
bandwidth and storage option. We make it simple for you!

____ Will I get all future updates?

Yes, you will have access to all the updates made to the platform.

____ Can I request a feature to be developed for me?

Yes, our team will work rigorously to develop a requested feature, especially
for your business. Our customization capabilities are what make us the best.

____ Is my data secure?

Illumine takes your privacy very seriously. All photos and videos of a child
are posted only to the accounts of the parents or guardians of the child. No
one else can access this information without express consent being provided by
the parents or guardians. All account passwords are encrypted for additional
security. For further information, please see our privacy policy.

____ Are there any payment processing charges?

No, Illumine does not charge you any payment processing fees.

____ Do you provide APIs?

Yes, we provide APIs to integrate with your existing system. You can request
the API documentation and even request additional APIs.
